summary: This mod adds a new follower, Istalindir, to the game.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a follower, Istalindir, to the game. She can be found in Windhelm at the palace of kings. The follower has the ability to cast some advanced level spells. 

This is my first mod, and I just wanted to get a feel for how to do it. I plan to make more follower mods in the future with more features. Give feed back if any troubles arise. 

-----------------------------------------
Note: \\\'better females by bella\\\' recommended to have the mod look more like the pictures shown.

-----------------------------------------
If there are any difficulties with this mod, please feel free to leave a comment and I will see what I can do.

*Feel free to add screenshots
author: Ghostrunner24
